content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree to any price lower than 750 euros. I was trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: We did not agree on a final price as I did not want to continue the negotiation and was trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. The highest price I was willing to accept was 750 euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am not satisfied with the outcome of the negotiation. I consider myself a 1 on this scale because I was trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt
